document_data.caption: A map showing Threlloch on Canthrell between Norheim and Norland.
document_data.name: Threlloch
document_data.mainbody: '''Threlloch''' was a [[Northlander]] settlement on the island of [[Canthrell]] in [[Norheim]] in the [[Moonshae Isles]].{{Cite interactive atlas}}{{Cite dungeon/196/Backdrop: Moonshae Isles|11}}
document_data.Geography: Threlloch was located near the center of the island on the southeastern shore along the [[Sea of Moonshae]] which sheltered the settlement from the harsh storms that rolled in from the [[Trackless Sea]]. It was the only settlement on Canthrell.
